generateColorPalette(int) - Method in class mosaic.palettegenerator.ImageBasedColorPaletteGenerator
Takes a random sampling of pixels from the image, clusters them based on color (as many clusters as desired colors) and then generates a palate based on those clusters.

generateColorPalette(int) - Method in class mosaic.palettegenerator.RandomColorPaletteGenerator
Returning colors as a subset of a fixed palette ensures that multiple images will use the same colors even for different palette sizes.
